tools_blockchains_subheader: 连线并管理 EOSIO 区块链上的账户
tools_change_mirror_cast_vote: 在投票前，计算投票权重
tools_change_use_sqrl_token: 使用 SQRL 通证支付资源
tools_change_show_resources: 在钱包中显示网络资源
tools_change_skip_link_modal: 点击第三方链接时，发出提示信息
tools_change_spam_transfer_filter: 过滤垃圾交易（历史记录中不会显示发送给您少于 0.0005 {{tokenSymbol}} 的交易）
tools_change_timeout: 在闲置的情况下，自动锁上钱包
tools_contact_confirm_delete_text: 请问您是否确认要删除此合约？
tools_contacts_none: 首先，请点击上方的 ‘添加合约’ 以添加您的第一个合约。
tools_create_account_text: 在 EOSIO 网络上创建账户，并支付创建费。
tools_customtokens_subheader: 选择要追踪并且扫描余额的定制通证。
tools_delegation_info_content: 通过委托，一个账户能质押通证，为其他账户提供 CPU 及带宽。在任何时候，原账户可以取消委托，在三天后拿回质押的通证，通证在任何时候都在原账号的掌控下，除非在委托的时候勾选了‘转让’的选项，这个选项将把通证转让到对方账户中。
tools_delegation_subheader_text: 增加、修改、移除您账户中的委托
tools_delegations_none: 无委托或委托还在读取中。
tools_description: 管理账户所需要的工具。
tools_form_create_account_account_name_w: 账户名通常是 12 字符。除非使用 Premium Namespace，否则账户创建将失败。
tools_form_create_account_confirming_hea: 将创建出以下账号将，费用是
您也选择将委托资源给这个账号，总共委托
tools_form_create_account_delegated_reso: 建议委托给新账户至少 0.5000 {{tokenSymbol}} 到 CPU 与带宽，让账户能在网络上有能力做操作。
tools_form_create_account_public_keys_wa: 最佳实践建议使用各别的 ACTIVE 及 OWNER 钥匙，OWNER 钥匙应当做离线管理，ACTIVE 钥匙做为日常使用。
tools_form_create_account_ram_price_esti: 预估的 RAM 价格是
tools_form_create_account_transfer_token: 质押给 CPU 及带宽的指定通证数量将转让给新账户所有。
tools_form_permissions_auth_current_key_: 钱包中的私钥将不会被自动取代。如果更改此钥匙，您可能需要重置本地钱包，并再次导入新的私钥。
这个钱包目前使用这个钥匙。
tools_form_permissions_auth_instructions: 如需更改此许可，请输入您所掌握私钥的对应公钥。
tools_form_permissions_auth_linkauth: 如需限制账户许可，只执行特定指令，请在下方清单中勾选。
tools_form_proxy_info_confirming_header: 您将在 tlsproxyinfo 智能合约中添加以下信息：
tools_form_proxy_info_message: 您已注册成为投票代理，但在 tlsproxyinfo 智能合约中没有您的信息，提交以下表格以增加您投票代理的曝光，在智能合约中添加信息将使用到您的 RAM。
tools_keys_key_generation_subheader: 生成公钥和私钥对，用于 EOSIO 生态。
tools_keys_key_generation_warning_conten: 此密钥生成器不会在应用中储存密钥对。如果您有需要用这密钥，请备份好密钥信息。
tools_keys_key_validator_current_subhead: 信息基于上方提供的私钥
tools_keys_key_validator_header: 密钥验证器（私钥到公钥）
tools_keys_key_validator_info_content: 此工具对私钥进行验证，并显示相对应的公钥。为提升安全性，此工具能在所有钱包模式下使用，也可离线使用。使用时，请在下方输入私钥信息，工具将验证私钥是否有效，并会提供相对应的公钥信息。
tools_keys_key_validator_info_header: 在下方输入私钥进行验证，并获取对应的公钥信息
tools_keys_key_validator_subheader: 将私钥转换成相对用的公钥
tools_modal_permissions_auth_edit_button: 禁用 - 需要另一个密钥（可能是 OWNER 密钥）才能修改此许可。
tools_permissions_app_subheader: Search for or remove existing app integrations
tools_permissions_app_warning_header: An Important Note on Action Permissions
tools_permissions_app_warning_subheader: Never create contract action permissions with token transfers
tools_permissions_current_wallet_subhead: The above key is currently being used to operate this wallet.
tools_permissions_current_wallet_watch_s: When using a Watch Wallet and updating permissions, the Cold Wallet signer will require the type of permission you are attempting to change. Changing the active key will require using the active key in, while changing the owner key will require the owner key.
tools_permissions_info_content: The permissions tool will allow you to specify new Public Keys and set them as the controlling authority of an account. When changing an accounts keys, ensure that you have the associated Private Key backed up someplace safe. Changing the Public Keys on an account to a keypair in which the Private Key is unknown will cause the account to become permanantly inaccessible.
tools_permissions_subheader: Create and modify an accounts permissions
tools_permissions_warning_content: After updating this permission, if you do not have access to the associated private key you will lose access to this authority (and potentially the account).
tools_permissions_warning_header: Changing keys is a potentially dangerous action
tools_proxy_form_message_about_to_regist: You are about to register this account as a proxy voter. After registration other accounts will be able to set this account as a proxy.
tools_proxy_form_message_about_to_unregi: You are about to unregister this account as a proxy voter. After unregistering no accounts will be allowed to set this account as a proxy.
tools_proxy_text_not_registered: By registering as a proxy voter, other accounts will be able to set this account as their proxy. Any producer voting weight from those accounts will be applied to the votes this account makes.
tools_proxy_text_registered: This account is now registered and available to be used as a proxy account.
tools_reset_body_1: This will delete all of your local wallets, passwords, settings, custom tracked tokens, and contacts from this computer. The application will then restart and intiate the welcome and initial import process.
tools_reset_header_subheader: This feature will completely reset this application to a default installation state.
tools_settings_subheader: Configure the local application settings based on your preference.
tools_state_chain_subheader: Configuration values for the EOSIO blockchain.
tools_state_globals_subheader: Current global values for the EOSIO blockchain.
tools_wallet_state_subheader: An overview of the local wallet state. This information can be used to help debug the application.
tools_wallets_subheader: Add, remove, and swap between the various wallets loaded within the app.
